CustomField.description: Externally calculated field. Based on Amount, meaning the currency-specific rollups are the only fields that arenâ€™t converted to USD. Soft credit is defined by OCR = Funder - Soft Credit, DAF, Workplace Giving, Sponsor, Agency and grabs amount from PSC. Qualifying stages = Received, Received as Unconditional Pledge, Received as Conditional Pledge. All Opp Record Types except PG. Only the master field should be accessible to users.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The sum of the Amount of all received EUR Opportunities where the Contact has a hard or soft credit (Planned Gifts not included).
CustomField.label: Total Amount Committed EUR
